title: All the Backlist! September 6, 2019
description:
This week, Patricia talks about two excellent older books for Sexual Health Month!
This episode is sponsored by All That’s Dead by Stuart MacBride.
Subscribe to All the Books! using RSS, Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or Stitcher and never miss a beat book.
Sign up for the weekly New Books! newsletter for even more new book news.
This content contains affiliate links. When you buy through these links, we may earn an affiliate commission.

Books Discussed on the Show
S.E.X., second edition: The All-You-Need-To-Know Sexuality Guide to Get You Through Your Teens and Twenties by Heather Corinna
The Body Is Not an Apology: The Power of Radical Self-Love by Sonya Renee Taylor
